ygData.subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
ygData.msgSnippet: Burning Hammer yawns. Burning hammer: What the hell are you showing me those things for? Now back to work. Burning Hammer punches the Hero and knocks his head

From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

Burning Hammer yawns.

Burning hammer: What the hell are you showing me those things for? Now back
to work.

Burning Hammer punches the Hero and knocks his head off.

The Hero: Ow! Hey, wait! Fight me!

Burning Hammer: Goodbye, holograms!

Burning Hammer walked closer to the Chivtron base.

Burning Hammer: And now you all are going to die...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2001 10:49 PM
Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base


> The Recons burst into immediate laughing at burning hammer's futile
> attempts. "You don't get it do you burning hammer? You can't kill us we're
> all holograms. The real Recon isn't even here right now, all together we
> formed a very firm hologram, now with us seperated from each other we
can't
> be hurt. But the crucifixes can still hurt you," teh holograms said and
held
> out the crucifixes.
>
>
> >From: "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@...>

fire

> >

> > > "You are the devil himself an I will destroy you. The reason the
energon
> >is
> > > not affecting me is because I'm not really a transformer, you couldn't
> >even
> > > tell that I am not real, HA! Where's the all mighty seeing power of
> >yours

> > > circle around Burning Hammer. "Which of us is the real Recon and which
> >of
> >us
> > > is a hologram," they all asked at once. (The rules said no drones or
> >humans,
> > > they never said anything about holograms.)

of

> > > >in fact. How is it that you are holding it if all transformers are
weak
> >to
> > > >it, hmm? You speak like you are god. I am god!...
